```{=html}
<script>
(function() {
  function init() {
    var projects = [];
    var links = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="posts/projects"]');
    links.forEach(function(link) {
      var text = link.textContent.trim();
      if (text && text.length > 3) {
        var exists = projects.some(function(p) { return p.url === link.href; });
        if (!exists) {
          projects.push({ title: text, url: link.href });
        }
      }
    });
    
    console.log('Found projects:', projects.length);
    
    var projectCountEl = document.getElementById('project-count');
    if (projectCountEl) projectCountEl.textContent = projects.length || '0';
    
    var categoryCountEl = document.getElementById('project-category-count');
    if (categoryCountEl) categoryCountEl.textContent = projects.length > 0 ? '1' : '0';
  }
  
  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 100);
  } else {
    window.addEventListener('load', function() { setTimeout(init, 100); });
  }
})();
</script>
```
